www.bookedin.net
Contact: Mike Iwasiow
Location: Winnipeg (Mb), Canada
Product: A complete user-friendly web-based solution to let owners of SMBs easily manage their schedule.
ArcBees product used: Gwt-Platform, Jukito, Consulting services
Testimonial:
At BookedIN, we started using GWT-platform when the project was still in its infancy. We had already started with GWT-dispatch and GWT-presenter but after reviewing the code, the samples, and the direction the project was taking, we decided to migrate to GWTP instead and we couldn't be happier with it. The project is well-designed with just the right mix of features without making the project bloated. The API is intuitive and easy-to-follow and the people behind the project are very receptive to feedback. Since we started using GWTP, we've been happy to see a very strong ecosystem grow around it with regular activity on both the code and the discussion list. I can't recommend GWTP enough.

Web site: www.cloud-inside.com
Contact: Piotr Stawinski
Location: Poland
Product: Consulting and development services on cloud technology
ArcBees product used: Gwt-Platform
Testimonial:
Once you start to create webapps using GWT, delighted by the convenience of this technology you won't use anything else. This is precisely what happened in the case of Cloud Inside, a polish software company. GWT is a great tool and GWTP is great framework to exploit it. Choosing GWTP as a development framework significantly accelerated the process of manufacturing sites, reduced the amount of code and simply boosted joy of programming. Not to mention the invaluable features of GWTP such as code splitting, generating content for search engine crawlers, or support for nested presenters pattern.
GWTP is a very convenient and useful framework, I recommend it to anyone who does GWT programming.
